trends: There have been 8 other sightings in Tracy
There were no other sightings in Tracy on or around June 15th 2011
divs: Sighting DetailsI was sitting at my picnic table ,glanced at the sky to watch the sun set.As soon as I looked up I saw the object. It was traveling in a straight line from north to south.It traveled in a flat line along the horizon.It was very reflective so it was easy to detect.I didn't know what it might be but when it disappeared twice I first thought UFO. This object was cigar shaped.It had a short vapor trail.As I watched it the vapor trail began to vanish. As the vapor trail was almost gone,the object disappeared.This vanishing and re-appearing happened twice in a cloudless sky. After the second vanishing both trail and object totally disappeared. The event lasted approx 2 min.I have never seen anything like it. the event didn't last long enough for a photo or a video.
Summary: As the sun was setting I noticed a strange object in the sky to the west. It kept disappearing and reappearing.
